title: Flipped Learning Design and Operational Strategies for Accounting Education

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: A flipped-learning-based accounting education environment for working professionals to strengthen job-relevance in their learning experiences.

learning_goals: Learners can master basic accounting principles by completing over 90% of pre-learning video content
Learners can solve case analysis problems with over 80% participation in flipped classroom activities
Learners can apply and explain over 85% of pre-learning content to practical situations through formative assessments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
